main event: Several witnesses observed four dazzling white globes moving rapidly in the sky near Coopersville, Michigan in April 1951.
interesting points: The globes were described as sparkling and silver in color, The witnesses reported no sound or visible propulsion, The sighting lasted about five minutes, The objects appeared to be traveling in a group eastward, The conclusion suggested they might be balloons but with insufficient data to confirm.
sighted object: four sparkling globes in the sky
witness description: a farmer and possibly others in the area
